name: Chilean Tuna Salad
ingredients: 1 Large head Romaine lettuce, shredded & set aside 1/2 bunch cilantro chopped
12 oz. tuna drained & separated with fork 1 1/2 lemons, squeezed (I used 2)
1 cup or less real mayonnaise 1 large tomato, diced (I used Cherry tomatoes)
1 whole bunch green onions, sliced 1 cucumber peeled and diced
steps: Fold all ingredients together until lettuce is evenly coated. Serve immediately. Enjoy!
